title: I never go up to high ranked cause this fking reconnect !
body: this is not first time the reconnect problem, I understand you are try hard to fix it.. But this is take me to hell in ranked... every time you though will in loading and play but it turn out dark screen and reconnect again. Unfortunate,  my team remake ... and said I am afk , leaver ... got ban low priority .... bs...  I lost total 80 point in ranked and got ban from 5- 20 minutes to many hours.... thank ...

replies.body:
The *known issue* listed on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) only affects the first time your client transitions from champ select to the loading screen. If this is continuously happening past the *first connection attempt*, then it's an entirely different issue.

Please let me know if you're seeing continuous connection issues past the first reconnect or any issues in-game that may be causing your situation.
So you lost a Ranked game due to connection, and then proceeded to play more Ranked?

It's a bug. Rito won't turn off leaver buster for remakes when PPl are forced to cancel and reconnect then load two or three minutes which is more than enough to remake. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
